data.title: Racing Video Games | 6
data.meta_description: Page 6. Racing video games sorted by popularity among gamers. Racers are straightforward â€“ cross the finish line first. These games let you race anyything from WRC cars, RC toys, quads, and firetrucks.
data.text:
Test Drive Overdrive

Racing 27 May 2002

The next installment of the famous series of car races, which began in 1987. TD Overdrive is not a realistic simulation - it has an agility model. The races take place in four main cities and there is a choice of approx. 20 sports car models.

PS2XBOX

Need for Speed: Most Wanted 5-1-0

Racing 15 November 2005

Need for Speed: The Wanted Bridge is another part of a series that has been developed since the mid-1990s. After the night escapades from both sides of the Need for Speed: Underground, the time has come for a sporty car to move in completely different conditions.

PSP

Street Legal Racing: Redline

Racing 23 July 2003

Street car races, inspired, among others, by the famous film The Fast and the Furious. The title is similar to Need for Speed or Midnight Club 2 - our task is to be ahead of the competition and not to be caught by the police.

PC

MotoGP 14

Racing 20 June 2014

Another installment of the popular motorcycle game series, which since last year has returned once again under the wings of the experienced Italian Milestone studio. In the game we can guide a novice motorcyclist through all levels of sports career, or take part in the simulation of a single competition or the entire racing season. MotoGP 14 traditionally has a full license of the Motorcycle World Championship, so the game includes more than a hundred real riders, contemporary and historical.

PCPS4X360PS3PSV

GRID: Autosport

Racing 24 June 2014

Another installment in a popular series of racing games developed by Codemasters. In contrast to DiRT - the other flagship franchise of the British developer, GRID: Autosport continues the tradition established by the TOCA Touring Car Championship and TOCA Race Driver series, that is, racing on asphalt tracks. The player assumes the role of a professional driver who competes against other racers, but he also has to care about his team members and stick to sponsorship contracts.

PCSwitchX360PS3ANDiOS

RACE 07

Racing 27 September 2007

RACE '07: The WTCC Game is an official continuation of the 2006 edition of RACE: The WTCC Game. Once again, we are dealing with an extremely complex driving simulator, created mainly for the champions of virtual four wheels.

PC

WRC 10

Racing 02 September 2021

WRC 10 is the twentieth instalment of the series of rally games licensed by the World Rally Championship. This time, the developers have taken care not only to modernise the driving model and include all the teams taking part in the competition, but also to add an anniversary historical mode.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4Switch

GRID

Racing 11 October 2019

Another part of the famous racing series, which offers the opportunity to race a wide range of different types of cars - from tourist cars to muscle cars. Production introduces a few new solutions to the cycle.

PCXONEPS4

Monster Jam Showdown

Racing 29 August 2024 (early access since 26 August 2024)

The ninth motorsport game based on the Monster Jam license, offering real monster trucks and arenas. Monster Jam Showdown allows to race, perform stunts or even start in destruction derby events. We can compete both in stadiums, as well as famous outdoor locations in the USA.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4Switch

MX Bikes

Racing 07 October 2019

MX Bikes is an online realistic indie motorcross game by PiBoSo. Despite simple visuals, the game features advanced motorcycle physics and behavior.

PC

#DRIVE Rally

Racing November 2024 (early access since November 2024)

An arcade rally game from a Polish studio, inspired by the rallies and racing games of the 1990s. #DRIVE Rally offers a unique cartoonish graphics style, a career mode and a funny co-pilot who besides reading the notes also comments on our progress and makes jokes.

PC

Wreckreation

Racing 2025

Wreckreation is an arcade sandbox racing game. It offers a 400-square-kilometer open world that can be modified and populated as you see fit, and then you can invite your friends to play on your terms.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4

Forza Motorsport 6: Apex

Racing 06 September 2016

A free-to-play spin-off installment to the bestselling racing game series known from the subsequent generations of the Xbox console. It was developed by Turn 10 Studios with PC users in mind. The gameplay of Forza Motorsport 6: Apex does not differ significantly from other full-fledged installments in the series and emphasizes simulation aspects (while still offering a number of gameplay facilities). Compared to the full-price console version, the title is significantly poorer content-wise.

PC

Import Tuner Challenge

Racing 27 September 2006

Import Tuner Challenge (aka Tokyo Xtreme Racer) is a game that belongs to the extremely popular series of street races, which dates back to the Dreamcast console. The latest part of the series, this time for the Xbox 360, is titled Shutokou Battle X in Japan.

X360

CTR: Crash Team Racing

Racing 19 October 1999

Digital reissue of the fourth game about the adventures of the nice mutant Crash. Unlike the previous parts of the cycle, which were three-dimensional platforms, this time we are dealing with crazy go-kart races. Crash's and Dr. Cortex's teams stand for a big tournament organized by the best rally driver in the universe - Nitrous Oxide.

PS3PS1PSPPSV

Road Redemption

Racing 04 October 2017

A brutal motorcycle racing game and a spiritual successor to the legendary Road Rash that debuted in 1991 on Sega Mega Drive. It was developed by DarkSeas Games, an American studio established by experienced developers. In the game, we assume the role of a criminal who has been recently released from prison and has to regain his former position in a motorcycle gang. Soon, he discovers that his old friends from the gang were responsible for him getting arrested and imprisoned.

PCXONEPS4Switch

Crash Time 5: Undercover

Racing 28 September 2012

Another installment of the racing series developed since 2000, based on the popular RTL television crime series. This one, numbered 5, was once again developed by the team from the Synetic studio, previously known for the World Racing series, among others. The heroes of the game are invariably detectives Semir and Ben, who this time face a dangerous gang of luxury car smugglers.

PCX360PS3

Moorhuhn Kart 3

Racing 01 August 2007

Moorhuhn Kart 3 is the third installment of the series of crazy races with Moorhuhn chicken in the lead role. Players have the opportunity to play one of the six drivers participating in a crazy go-kart race. The game was produced by Phenomedia Publishing studio.

PC

Safari Biathlon

Racing 21 September 2001

Car races, in which players drag down futuristic, armed with heavy weapon turbo-cars, along routes located on three different planets.

PC

F1 2010

Racing 21 September 2010

The first edition of the official F1 World Cup game by the British company Codemasters. The production encourages all racing fans with a full license for all the elements of this exciting competition.

PCX360PS3

Alarm for Cobra 11: Highway Nights

Racing 18 November 2009

The next installment of the budget racing series based on the popular German series Cobra: Special Branch. This is the fourth time the game has been developed by the Synetic studio, known mainly for the highly acclaimed racing game World Racing 2. In the game, we once again face a powerful criminal organization, but this time the developers have introduced quite a few innovations to the gameplay, radically changing the way the story unfolds and enriching it with numerous film interludes.

PCX360
